title: Family of Antiderivatives
description: Interactive visualization showing how different values of the constant C produce a family of parallel antiderivative curves. Demonstrates that all antiderivatives of a function differ only by a constant, with tangent lines at the same x-value having identical slopes.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Calculus
Antiderivatives
Integration
Constant of Integration
Family of Functions
prerequisites: Concept of slope and tangent lines
learningObjective: Students will explain why antiderivatives differ by a constant
